ygData.subject: Re: General new observations from a level 13 wiz
ygData.msgSnippet: I hesistate to say it but from what I ve been told you better check again with your Druid friend or maybe you should ask another druid..... The power spell for
ygData.messageBody:
I hesistate to say it but from what I've been told you better check again
with your Druid friend or maybe you should ask another druid..... The power
spell for Druids at lvl 14 is stinging swarm which is a DOT spell.... The
class that is close to outdamaging us at this level is Enchanters and
definitely not Druids.... Yup I'm just gonna suggest you find another Druid
to talk to instead of your "Guildmate". I run with alot of Druids in the
game. Let us know what you find out when you talk to someone else.... :o)

Oh and what was the animation that this "Conflaguration" used while you guys
were standing there testing it out?


Cinius Shade Master of the 6th Circle(Mith Marr)

> 14th level gets a spell called conflageration(sp) it does 65 points of
> damage for 35 mana. 1.86 dam per mana. I do at level 13, 79 points of
> damage for 60 mana. 1.32 dam per mana.
